name: bendalloy
description: Bendalloy is a mysterious and dynamic alloy created by precisely combining cadmium, zinc, and silver. Its shifting hues and volatile properties make it a material of both scientific intrigue and advanced technological potential.

allomancy.description: Allows {PAWN} to speed up time in a bubble around the user.

feruchemy.description: Stores nutrition, allowing users to go without food.

store.description: This pawn is storing nutrition in a bendalloy metalmind. Their metabolism speeds up dramatically, burning through food reserves at an accelerated rate. They become hungry faster and must eat more to maintain energy â€” but the nutrition is preserved for future emergencies.

tap.description: This pawn is tapping a bendalloy metalmind, decreasing the need for food. Their metabolism slows down, burning through metal reserves in place of nutrients.
